DataElement.preferredName: Infusion Delay And/Or Cancel Reason Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe the reason for the infusion delay and/or cancellation.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord._Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._Postpone indefinitely or annul something that was scheduled._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A method of putting fluids, including drugs, into the bloodstream. Also called intravenous infusion.

Concepts.definition: Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.

Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
